segments.text: What is the annual salary for this job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The annual salary is sixty-five thousand dollars per year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What does the benefits package include ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This job pays for half of your medical , dental , and disability .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do we get paid time off ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have a total of 21 days paid time off which can be used for vacation , personal , or sick leave .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We still offer a traditional retirement plan that pays out if you stay with the company for 5 years or more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I get company provided specialized training ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We offer full tuition reimbursement for job related classes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's on the second floor in Suite 201 .
segments.speaker: S2
